初遇.encontent:
Alright, ready to welcome me! Prepare your softest brush, smoothest
 silk, flaxseed oil or something more expensive, and ... Hey,
 is that a carrot? Ohh! For me? Thank you!
初遇.content:
好的，迎接我吧！你要准备最柔软的梳子，光滑的绸缎、亚
麻，或是更昂贵的香油，以及……嘿，那是胡萝卜吗？哦
！给我的？谢谢你！

箱中气候.encontent: Darley Clatter is ready, is ready, is ready!
箱中气候.content: 哒哒达利，正在待命，正在待命，正在待命！

致未来.encontent:
Run, chase liberty. Now I am racing on the ground.
 In the future, I will be dashing in the sky!
致未来.content:
奔跑，更自由地奔跑。现在我在地上奔跑，未来，我将在
天上奔跑！

孑立.encontent:
Ho, ho ho! From now on, this is the racecourse of Darley
 Clatter!
孑立.content: 嚯嚯嚯，现在开始，这里就是哒哒达利的跑马场了！

问候.encontent: You are granted an audience with the Darley Arabian.
问候.content: 达利阿拉伯，接受你的觐见。

朝晨.encontent:
Let the morning sunlight shine on my mane. It deserves
 that ... I mean the sunlight.
朝晨.content: 该让晨光洒满我的鬃毛，它值得这个——我是说晨光。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Darley sometimes gets up late. There's nothing to be
 blamed.
信任-朝晨.content: 达利偶尔也会赖床，这没什么大不了的。

夜暮.encontent:
Please offer me a bed with a soft mattress, goose down
 duvet, rabbit fur cover, delicate sewing patterns
 and designer perfume sprayed.
夜暮.content:
请给我一张软床，它得是鹅毛的芯子，兔毛的皮面，绣着
花纹儿，喷洒香水儿。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
That is awesome! You must really be looking forward to spending
 a wonderful evening with Darley! Oh the story, about the golden
 carrot in the lake, you have my permission to tell it one more
 time.
信任-夜暮.content:
太好了！你一定十分期待和达利共度夜晚！关于那个有关
湖中金萝卜的故事，我允许你再讲一遍。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: Oh ... I can't deny you are really good at patting.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 呜……不得不承认，这是只驯马的“好手”。

袖与手.encontent:
Faster than the wind! I am undoubtedly the fastest
 runner!
袖与手.content: 比风更快的速度！陆地上当之无愧的王者！

衣着与身形.encontent:
Take a look at my beautiful muscles! I don't need to
 explain how fabulous I am.Hey, watch out! Rub me in
 the direction my mane grows.
衣着与身形.content:
瞧瞧这充满力量感的线条，我的优秀简直不言自明～嘿，当
心点！抚摸时要注意顺着毛发的生长方向。

嗜好.encontent:
The breeze that combs my mane, the golden carrot, and
 my little Lilian ...  Oh, you don't know her? She
 is my lady ... Ahem, my maid!
嗜好.content:
掠过鬃毛的风，金色的胡萝卜，以及我那个年幼的莉莉安
……哦？你不认识她，她是我的小主人……咳，仆从！

赞赏.encontent:
Oh yes! The great Lord of the Wooden Rocking Horse,
 is me, who grants you the right to ride on my back!
赞赏.content:
哦，是的！伟大的木马之王，也就是我，允许你骑在我背
上！

亲昵.encontent: Adorable? Ahh? You don't even have a taste!

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Mass production? Oh my god!The great ... great Darley
 Arabian is the one and only!!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
量产？我的上帝！伟……伟大的达利阿拉伯是独一无二的
！！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Hey, hey! Come over here. I have a secret to share.
 I am the legendary Darley Arabian ... Why are you
 laughing? Come on this is not funny at all!
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
嘿，嘿！过来，我有个秘密要告诉你，我就是传说中的达
利阿拉伯……为什么你在笑？这不好笑！

独白.encontent:
All the horses shall race freely, no matter made of wood or iron,
 glass or flesh and blood. As long as they possess the soul of
 a real horse, they are qualified to race.
独白.content:
所有马儿都应当自由自在地奔跑，无论它们是木头做的、铁
做的、玻璃做的，或是血与肉做的。只要那之中有着马的
灵魂，它们便能跑。

择选高阶咒语.encontent: Right, that's exactly what I live for.

择选至终的仪式.content: 伟大的达利阿拉伯！此时！此刻！

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: The endowments from the great Arabian!

战斗胜利.encontent:
Hey, anyone there?I need to get my hoofs ... Oops,
 I mean wheels cleaned.
战斗胜利.content:
嘿，有人吗？我需要清洁下我的马蹄……噢，我是说轮子
。

洞悉.encontent:
Darley Arabian does not need a clean body. The mud
 is the glory!
洞悉.content: 达利阿拉伯并不需要光洁的身躯，满身泥泞正如功勋。
